dashboard.title: Subscription & Billing
dashboard.subtitle: Manage your subscription, billing, and payment methods
dashboard.noSubscriptionDesc: You don't have an active subscription. Choose a plan to get started.

discount.hint: Have a discount code? Enter it above to save on your subscription.

trial.title: Start Your Free Trial
trial.subtitle: Try {{plan}} free for a limited time
trial.step1Desc: We'll send you a reminder 3 days before your trial ends.
trial.step2Desc: Decide whether to subscribe or let your trial expire.
trial.step3Desc: If you subscribe, your data and settings are preserved.
trial.notEligibleDefault: You have already used a free trial or are not eligible at this time.

features.fullAccess: Full access to all plan features

trial.banner: {{days}} days left in your free trial
trial.upgradeNow: Upgrade now to keep your access
trial.daysRemainingMessage: You have {{days}} days remaining in your free trial.

plans.title: Choose Your Plan
plans.subtitle: Select the plan that best fits your needs
plans.noPlansDesc: There are no plans available at this time. Please contact support.

changePlan.question: Can I change my plan later?
changePlan.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. When upgrading, you'll be charged the prorated difference. When downgrading, the new rate takes effect at the next billing cycle.

cancel.question: What happens if I cancel?
cancel.answer: If you cancel, you'll continue to have access until the end of your current billing period. Your data will be retained for 30 days after cancellation.

trial.question: Is there a free trial?
trial.answer: Yes, most plans include a free trial period. During the trial, you have full access to all features. You won't be charged until the trial ends.

billing.title: Billing History
billing.subtitle: View your invoices and payment history

invoices.noInvoicesDesc: Invoices will appear here once you have an active subscription.

paymentMethods.title: Payment Methods
paymentMethods.subtitle: Manage your payment methods for automatic billing
paymentMethods.noMethodsDesc: Add a payment method to enable automatic billing.
paymentMethods.expiringSoon: This card is expiring soon. Please update it.
paymentMethods.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this payment method? This action cannot be undone.
paymentMethods.securityDesc: Your payment information is encrypted and securely stored. We never store your full card number.

changePlan.title: Change Plan
changePlan.subtitle: Upgrade or downgrade your subscription
changePlan.upgradeNotice: You will be charged the prorated difference immediately. Your new plan features will be available right away.
changePlan.downgradeNotice: Your plan will change at the end of the current billing period. You will continue to have access to your current features until then.
